name: Fast Bus Ticket
shortDescription: Welcome to the Bus Ticket Booking Website! This platform is designed to facilitate the booking of bus tickets.
description: Whether you're a passenger looking to book a seat
A bus owner managing bus & trips
An admin overseeing the system, or a super admin with ultimate control

name: Smart Tech PC Builder
shortDescription: Welcome to the Smart Tech PC Builder website! To create a user-friendly platform where users can build their own PC by selecting various components.
description: Detailed information is available for each PC component, including image, name, category, availability status, price, description, key features, individual rating, average rating, and reviews.
Users can select components to build their PC in the PC Builder page.
The PC Builder page is protected, and only logged-in users can access it.

name: Book Catalog Web Application
shortDescription: Created a user-friendly Book Catalog Application with authentication, allowing users to explore, add, and manage their reading wishlist and reading list.
description: Developed a user-friendly Book Catalog Application using React and Redux Toolkit, enabling users to explore a vast collection of books and manage their reading preferences.
Implemented secure authentication features, allowing users to create accounts, log in, and access personalized wishlists and reading lists, enhancing the overall user experience.
Utilized Typescript, RTK Query, and Express, ensuring a seamless frontend and backend integration while providing a smooth, error-free experience for book enthusiasts.

name: Book Catalog Backend With PostgreSQL and Prisma
shortDescription: Supporting CRUD operations and user authentication. Seamlessly managed users, categories, books, and orders with secure role-based access.
description: Developed a robust backend for a Book Listing Application using TypeScript, Express, Prisma, and PostgreSQL. Implemented CRUD operations, pagination, and filtering, enabling efficient management of users, categories, books, and orders.

Designed and implemented secure user authentication, allowing users to sign up, log in, and access personalized features based on their roles. The application supports both admin and customer roles, ensuring a smooth user experience.

Created a comprehensive API with well-documented endpoints for user management, category handling, book listings, and order processing, meeting the project's requirements while offering a seamless and reliable experience.

name: Digital Cow Hut(Store)
shortDescription: Developed a TypeScript backend for an Online Cow Selling platform, enabling CRUD operations, error handling, and simulated transactions for Eid Ul Adha.
description: Created a resilient backend system for an Online Cow Selling platform, tailored for Eid Ul Adha preparations. It incorporates TypeScript, Express.js, and Mongoose to handle key functionalities.
Implemented comprehensive error handling and developed user and cow models with essential attributes, ensuring data integrity and smooth user experiences.

Designed API routes for creating, reading, updating, and deleting user and cow profiles. Additionally, a transactional system was introduced for cow purchases, including fund transfers and order history management.

name: Job Portal (Node JS, Express JS and MongoDB Project)
shortDescription: Difference functionality for candidate, hiring manager and admin role.
description: As a Hiring Manage create a new job, get previously created jobs, get single job details, and update job details.
As a Candidate can apply for a job with upload a CV/Resume in pdf format.
Users can signup and sign in. As an Admin can change the user role.

name: Quikie App
shortDescription: This is full stack website that for manage public crypto api and saved data to own database.
description: Used three hero cards draggable and rearrangeable.
[ Crypto / Stock Details Table] Retrieve and show details - Company/Crypto Name, Stock/Crypto Symbol, Market Cap / Current Price of the stocks/crypto in a 5-row table with pagination.

[ Crypto / Stock Details Table] Search using Company/Crypto Name and display result stocks in the table, Save Data.Saved Data Table] Delete & Retrieve Data using MongoDB and Node-Express API endpoints.
Navigation between Stock/Crypto Details Table page (/home) and Saved Data Tables Page(/view).
